Hey! ✌️

My name is Andreas Klinger.

I was founding team & CTO of Product Hunt, VPE of CoinList, Head of Remote at AngelList, and CTO at On Deck.

I also angel invest via Prototype Capital 🦾.

I was lucky to learn from a lot of people throughout my career.
On this page I try to summarize some learnings.
